name: Spider-Man: Whiny Spidey
description:
Do you like parodies of weird fanfic tropes?

If you’ve been reading Marvel fanfics for a while, you’ve probably come across some pretty stupid story patterns that seem to repeat themselves over and over again. I like to channel my irritation and eye rolling into parody content.

Deadpool used to love patrolling the streets with New York’s friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man, but lately things have been a little awkward between them. One day, Spider-Man finally talks to Deadpool about what’s been bothering him.

Whiny Spidey (creative title, I know) is basically a visual novel based on an old story of mine. I like making parodies of stupid tropes and patterns that I observe in stories.

Original Story: https://archiveofourown.org/works/24671101

This game has a couple of different endings and one kind of easter egg thing. Each ending is sort of like its own parallel universe.

This is a full game, not a demo, alpha, beta etc...
